Imagery Description: (a) Papposilen holding cista in left and thyrsus, with hanging female mask, Dionysos, halfNon Sepcifieddraped, riding on a panther, holding wreath in right and thyrsus with hanging female mask in left, maenad playing the flute, and small satyrNon Sepcifiedboy holding flute, all moving to right, (b) standing draped woman with phiale, Eros holding wreath and phiale; between them, a duck; stele to left
